modName: More D-Pad Hotkeys for Xbox 360 Controller
summary: Allows you to set seven hotkeys on your Xbox 360\'s directional pad (the normal left and right plus down and the diagonals).
descriptionHtml:
Instead of just left and right on your d-pad for your favorite hotkeys, this adds the diagonals and down as well. So that\'s:
1. up-left
2. left
3. down-left
4. down
5. down-right
6. right
7. up-right
Seven! Seven hotkeys!

A few notes:
- This will mess up scrolling through the favorites menu with the up and down buttons on the d-pad. Use the left analog stick instead. If this isn\'t acceptable, I have also uploaded one which will allow use to use the d-pad to scroll up and down at the expense of a hotkey.
- Hope you\'re good with pushing diagonals! ;)
- This has only received very quick testing...

Thanks to crazy-g for the whole controlmap.txt thing
author: entnvki
